# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new matrix with uninitialized memory.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializers

- **init(columns:)**: Creates a new matrix with the specified columns.

items.description: Creates a new matrix with the specified columns.
items.name: init(columns:)
